name: Candy Ball Marble 2
description:
Candy Ball Marble 2 - A newest and unique zuma-style game with a twist on the classic matching and marble-popping style.
It has a lot of new items to make the game much more interesting and challenging.
Shoot Candy marble by clicking on screen where you want the marble to go.
Clear marbles by getting three or more of the same color in a row.
